fields.summary: Delete on Terminate specified at run-time doesn't override image default

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When a user launches a BFEBS instance with DeleteOnTermination flag set to False, the volume associated with that instance is deleted when user terminates the instance.  This behavior is different than what is documented in AWS:

http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/RootDeviceStorage.html

"By default, the root device volume and the other volumes created when an Amazon EBS-backed instance is launched are automatically deleted when the instance terminates (in other words, their DeleteOnTermination flags are set to true by default). You can change the default behavior by setting the DeleteOnTermination flag to the value you want when you launch the instance. "

Steps to Reproduce:

1) Create EBS-backed image:

euca-register -n <name of BFEBS image> --root-device-name /dev/vda1 -b /dev/vda1=<snapshot id>

2) Launch instance with DeleteOnTermination flag set to false:

euca-run-instances <EMI id of BFEBS image> -b /dev/vda1=::false

3) Describe volumes to see which volume is associated with instance:

euca-describe-volumes 
VOLUME	vol-604E3FC8	 15	<snapshot id>	underworld	in-use	2012-06-10T19:12:52Z
ATTACHMENT	vol-604E3FC8	<instance-id>	/dev/sda1	attached	2012-06-10T19:12:52Z

4) Terminate BFEBS instance

euca-terminate-instances <instance id>
INSTANCE	<instance id>

5) Run euca-describe-volumes.  Volume will be deleted:

# euca-describe-volumes 
VOLUME	vol-604E3FC8	 15	<snapshot id>	underworld	deleted	2012-06-10T19:12:52Z

[Log information from test]

instance id:  i-D418422E
volume id: vol-604E3FC8
snapshot id: snap-A4183F60

[cloud-output.log]

Sun Jun 10 13:41:16 2012  INFO TerminateInstancesType  | :1339360876630:TerminateInstancesType:VM_TERMINATING:[TerminateInstancesType instancesSet=[i-D418422E] correlationId=eb680103-270b-4155-a8b1-bb57788e7b7e userId=eucalyptus effectiveUserId=eucalyptus _return=true statusMessage=null _epoch=null _services=[] _disabledServices=[] _notreadyServices=[]]

comments.body: this issue has been addressed in 3.1
setting back to 'investigating' to inquire as to further action (issue resolved in 3.1, linked to euca-2252)
I'm going to mark this as resolved unless anyone disagrees, this was fixed a while back in the linked ticket.
